title: Culture Gabfest Presents: Spoiler Special on It
description:
Dana Stevens and Slate culture writers Aisha Harris and Sam Adams discuss It, director Andy Muschietti’s take on the Stephen King novel, starring Bill Skarsgard and a host of young actors. WARNING: This podcast contains spoilers. Lots of spoilers. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
